testsuite.name: net.serenitybdd.plugins.jira.workflow.WhenLoadingTheWorkflow

testcase.name: should look for the jira-workflow.groovy configuration file by default
should try to load the system-defined workflow configuration if provided
should load the default workflow if available and no system property is set
the workflow specified by the system property should override the default workflow
when the system-specified workflow does not exist default to the convention-based workflow
when the system-specified and the convention-based workflows do not exist default to the bundledworkflow
should use the default workflow if no jira-workflow.groovy file is found
should activate workflow updates if the workflow is defined by the system property and exists
should not activate workflow updates if the workflow is defined by the system property but does not exist
should activate workflow updates if the convention-based workflow file exists
should not activate workflow updates if the convention-based workflow file does not exist
should activate default workflow if the corresponding system property is set
